messages.subject: Re: Pagan?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/7/00 6:55:49 PM Pacific Standard Time, jbabi@home.com writes: Are there any Pagan families on this list? ... Me!  Me! I have just
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/7/00 6:55:49 PM Pacific Standard Time, jbabi@...
writes:

<< >Are there any Pagan families on this list?
>
>Nanci K. >>

Me! Me!
I have just joined the list, lurking mainly because my son is still an
infant. I am considering homeschooling, so I wanted to find out more about
Unschooling.

Glad to meet you!

Susan and Wyatt

messages.subject: Pagan?
messages.msgSnippet: Nanci Could you please tell me what a Pagan is?  I have heard of it but I don t recall what it is. You can e-mail me privately if you want to.  Thank you for
messages.messageBody:
Nanci

Could you please tell me what a Pagan is? I have heard of it but I don't recall what it is.
You can e-mail me privately if you want to. Thank you for any info you can give me.

Gayle
jbabi@...
----- Original Message -----
From: Tom & Nanci Kuykendall
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, February 07, 2000 8:49 PM
Subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Social conformity


From: Tom & Nanci Kuykendall <tn-k4of5@...>

>Are there any Pagan families on this list?
>
>Nanci K.
>
>Why, yes.
>
>Brynn~

Wonderful! That makes two of us at least! Merry Meet!

Nanci K.
